page.title: 12Fishing-My Hobby-Ian Morris.
page.content: Most days when I am off school I pack my fishing equipment and go to the River Wye.I mostly fish for trout.I use size 8 hooks because I think size 8 hooks are the best for trout.I also use spinners,flies or worms.My rod is 6 foot long.I use all sorts of lead weights, split shots and lots of other weights.Some times I fish for Chub as well as Trout.It feels great when you have a bite after waiting hours and hours on the bank. My best catch was when I caught eight Trout in a day.My worst catch was when I caught no Trout at all.On average I catch about four Trout at a time. I love fishing on the River Wye, it is my favourite hobby.I fish alot with my father.
